pages.title: Decay Away
pages.text: Your last experiment was not only dangerous, but also quite a pain to get rid of.$(br)Just in case anything ever gets out of hand you created this modified variant. This time, though, to heal instead of flooding your base.$(br2)Yeah, that's probably better.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Gets rid of 99 % of all self-replicating microorganisms.
